author: pipermerriam
content:
<@!353136597522448385> this looks active: https://github.com/gballet/go-verkle

If someone wanted to follow along with your work on Verkle stuff is that a good repo to pay attention to?

author: gballet
content: yes, although it's still in development so the main reference is still Dankrad's https://github.com/ethereum/research/blob/master/verkle_trie/verkle_trie.py
